mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_number orderNumber, p.title, o.product_number productNumber, o.product_id productId, o.price, o.agent_price agentPrice, o.comment_status commentStatus, o.`status`, o.create_time createTime FROM orders o, products p WHERE o.order_number = #{orderNumber} AND o.product_id = p.id ORDER BY o.create_time
